metadata.name: Alt Horsemen (+War)
metadata.description:
This mod adds a completely new set of harbingers for the alternate path! Also comes with a unique (stronger) cube of meat variant.
Requires [b]Custom Stage API[/b] get it -> [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1348031964]here[/url]
-----------------------------------------
[h1]Harbinger Hitlist[/h1] [list] [*]Famine (Downpour/Dross) ✓ [*]War (Mines/Ashpit) ✓
[*]Death ✗ [*]Pestilence ✗ [*]Conquest (?) [*]Headless Horseman (?) [/list]
When the horsemen get added into the alt path officially, this mod will cease to exist forever (not really)
-----------------------------------------
[h1]Credits[/h1] lambchop_is_ok - Sprites (Famine) TotallyNotIlias - Sprites (War) hippocrunchy - Design, Sprites, Implementation jubbalub - Tumor Item Concept NotYourSagittarius - Original Character Design
